solution.text:
let the length of the stick be l
radius of larger tyre, R=_{{j*25}}_, and that of smaller tyre, r=_{{24*j}}_
The stick is tangent to the smaller circle and chord to the larger circle
this implies line joining the contact of the tangent to the center is \(\perp\) to the stick and bisects it
So, two right angle triangles can be seen
Using Pythagoras on a triangle we have
we have \(\frac l2\)=\(\sqrt {R^2-r^2}\)
we have \(\frac l2\)=\(\sqrt {_{{j*25}}_^2-_{{j*24}}_^2}\)
\(\Rightarrow \frac l2\)=\(\sqrt {_{j}_^2(25^2-24^2)}\)
\(\Rightarrow \frac l2\)=\(_{{7*j}}_\)
Length of stick l=2*_{{7*j}}_=_{{2*7*j}}_cm
